title: Oh please Riot, these Sejuani Skins just don't look any good to me (anymore)
body:
Now that Sejuani is beeing reworked anyway in mid season, I beg Riot to do something about these skins and their ability effects.
First of all, the new passive just looks so horrible on pretty much all of the skins except maybe Traditional and Bear Cavalry Sejuani.
On the Poro Rider Skin, it's even hard to see any difference to the normal model. Additionally, there's not even a point in buying that skin anymore, since their abilities are pretty much the same as in the default skin.

However my biggest concern is about the Beast Hunter and the Dawn Chaser Skins.
I LOVE their models so much and I hate to say, that all the ability effects make the skins as a whole look terrible, but they just do.
The problem is, that you took the idea of Sejuani beeing a "frosty" leader away into a completely different direction.
She either is riding on a dinosaur or a lion and the ice theme just doesn't fit with these themes anymore!
I beg you to at least make some recolors of the abilities (at least of the passive, as it is incredibly ugly imo) for at least these two skins just to match their theme. Also it doesn't make any sense anyway to make Sejuani sit on an ice saddle with the Dawn Chaser Skin. It just feels stupid to me.
I recommend you to take that skin a step towards some more golden colors.
For the Beast Hunter one, it may look good to give it some red.
I don't really know about that one, but the current icy blue just looks bad on both of them.
